examples.example: 下班后，我喜欢去公园散步放松心情。

translate.english: After work, I like to go to the park for a walk to relax.

examples.example: 下班之后，大家可以去做自己喜欢的事情来享受生活。

translate.english: After getting off work, everyone can do the things they like to enjoy life.

examples.example: 下班回到家，我会和家人一起愉快地享受晚餐时光。

translate.english: After getting off work and returning home, I will enjoy the dinner time happily with my family.
